page.title: 19New housing on the Expansion
page.content: Over 10 different builders are currently building on the expansion , some{6000 houses}having been built in the past 9 years . Most are simple traditionally built brick and concrete houses with extensive use of insulating blocks and{loft insulation {in the move to save}energy although surprisingly no builders offer double glazing as a standard feature . Prospective buyers are attracted by downstairs toilets , double garages and one builder offers a free cooker as an added incentive.{Country names like "Westbury Down" and "Oak Meadows" are given to sites to promote a rural feeling the irony being that the houses have been built on top of the real countryside . One builder admitted that a{bottle of whiskey}was the prize for the employee who thought of the best site name!
